courseInfo.title: JavaScript Programming Course
courseInfo.description: A comprehensive course covering JavaScript programming language.

lessons.title: What is JavaScript?
lessons.explanation: Introduction to JavaScript and its role in web development.
lessons.exercise: Write a simple 'Hello World' program in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Variables and Data Types
lessons.explanation: Understanding variables and different data types in JavaScript.
lessons.exercise: Create variables of different data types and perform operations on them.

lessons.title: Functions in JavaScript
lessons.explanation: Detailed explanation of functions and their usage in JavaScript.
lessons.exercise: Write a set of functions to solve specific problems.

lessons.title: Scope and Closures
lessons.explanation: Understanding scope and closures in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Promises and Async/Await
lessons.explanation: In-depth explanation of asynchronous programming using promises and async/await.
lessons.exercise: Develop an application using async functions and handle promises.

lessons.title: Event Loop
lessons.explanation: Understanding the event loop and its role in JavaScript concurrency.
lessons.exercise: Create examples to demonstrate event loop behavior.
